name: Sweep
description: Sweep the floor throughout the main floor.

name: Sweep and Swiffer
description: Sweep, swiffer, and shake out main floor rugs.

name: Clean Otis' Window
description: Clean the window on the far right (looking outside).

name: Dust
description: Dust all surfaces, window sills and remove all cobwebs.

name: Clean Out Refrigerator
description: Throw out any expired goods and reorganize the fridge/freezer.

name: Clean Refrigerator
description: Throw out any expired goods and reorganize the fridge/freezer. Wipe down all surfaces, empty and clean ice cube tray, and wipe down exterior

name: Clean Out Pantry
description: Throw out any expired goods and reorganize the pantry.

name: Clean Pantry
description: Throw out any expired goods and reorganize the pantry. Wipe down all surfaces, sweep and swiffer, and wipe down exterior

name: Clean Oven
description: Pull out the oven, clean the oven hole, exterior, and interior of oven.

name: Clean Fume Hood
description: Clean the filter in the fume hood above the oven.

name: Clean Kitchen Corner
description: De-clutter the window sills, clean behind sink, and clean garbage disposal.

name: Clean Dishwasher
description: Clean interior of dishwasher and filter.

name: Wash Futon Sheet
description: Wash futon sheet with dog contaminated blankets and rotate futon mattress.

name: Vacuum Couch
description: Vacuum cracks and top of couch cushions.

name: Wipe Down Slider
description: Wipe down the sliding glass door and vacuum tracks.

name: Clean Washing Machine
description: Clean washing machine per manufacturers instructions.

name: Check Fire Extinguisher
description: Check that the fire extinguisher is within proper charge.
